name: UIImage.Orientation
desc: Constants that specify the intended display orientation for an image.

items.name: case up
items.desc: The original pixel data matches the image's intended display orientation.

items.name: case down
items.desc: The image has been rotated 180° from the orientation of its original pixel data.

items.name: case left
items.desc: The image has been rotated 90° counterclockwise from the orientation of its original pixel data.

items.name: case right
items.desc: The image has been rotated 90° clockwise from the orientation of its original pixel data.

items.name: case upMirrored
items.desc: The image has been horizontally flipped from the orientation of its original pixel data.

items.name: case downMirrored
items.desc: The image has been vertically flipped from the orientation of its original pixel data.

items.name: case leftMirrored
items.desc: The image has been rotated 90° clockwise and flipped horizontally from the orientation of its original pixel data.

items.name: case rightMirrored
items.desc: The image has been rotated 90° counterclockwise and flipped horizontally from the orientation of its original pixel data.
